text:
="preserve">Walter J. Gex III (March 29, 1939 – November 12, 2020) was an American politician and lawyer. He was the United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Southern District of Mississippi from 1986 until his death. He was nominated by President Ronald Reagan. Gex was born in Bay St. Louis, Mississippi.
Gex died on November 12, 2020 at his home in Diamondhead, Mississippi at the age of 81.

annotations.surface_form: United States District Court for the Southern District of Mississippi
